Title: A Prophet
Writer: Thomas Bidegain (screenplay), Jacques Audiard (screenplay), Abdel Raouf Dafri (original screenplay), Nicolas Peufaillit (original screenplay)
Actors: Tahar Rahim, Niels Arestrup, Adel Bencherif, Reda Kateb
Plot: A young Algerian man is sent to a French prison.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 52 wins & 54 nominations.
Production: Centre National de la Cinématographie (CNC), France 2 (FR2), Conseil Régional de Provence-Alpes Côte d'Azur, Chic Films, Why Not Productions, Neon Productions, Page 114, Sofica Soficinéma 4, Celluloid Dreams, France 2 Cinéma, CinéCinéma, Sofica UGC 1, Soficinéma 5, Zyzzyx LLC, Canal+, Union Générale Cinématographique (UGC), Région Ile-de-France, BIM Distribuzione
